As #HurricaneIrma approaches, please visit http://www.floridadisaster.org  for the latest info on evacuation zones, storm prep & shelter locations. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJC3GVcXgAA96_4.jpg
@fema Know how to shut off utilities. Know where gas pilots are located & how the heating & a.c. system works. For help call local utility company
I’m a proud cosponsor of the bipartisan DREAM Act. Call your Senators and tell them to support it too: (202) 224-3121.

On @SenateFloor: Thanked & recognized #Texan heroes stepping forward for their community, including my friend, @MattressMack. #TexasStrong http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/905494756578484225/pu/img/ef409Y3Qt_zA779V.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/905494756578484225/pu/vid/1280x720/3RgzICuEQwXlEYVU.mp4

Mantenga el tanque de gasolina de su auto lleno. Si pierde la electricidad, las gasolineras no pueden operar por varios días.
@fema Keep your automobile fully fueled. If electric power is cut off, gas stations may not be able to operate pumps for several days.
The fight over @CFPB’s arbitration rule is about whose side you stand on: big Wall St banks or military families. http://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/59ac4b64e4b0d0c16bb52617

Thinking of all of our friends in Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, and Florida ahead of #IrmaHurricane. California has you in our prayers.
"Ryan and the Republican House leadership must bring the #DREAMAct to the floor for a vote without delay" -NP https://goo.gl/ikJVRx
This is a moment in time that is challenging us to stand up & be heard, not turn a blind eye but confront what is challenging our country.
For all of S.Fla, all preparations & evacuations should be COMPLETED by sunset on Friday. That is 60 hours from now. #Sayfie #HurricaneIrma http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJCLnduW4AEApdy.jpg

Here are a few tips to help prepare for #HurricaneIrma

RT @Residente En Washington DC junto a @berniesanders en una charla sobre las nuevas leyes anti emigrantes impuestas por el gobierno actual. #Dreamers ✊️ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJD4Bm_XUAUKN_n.jpg
Make sure you know where your home’s safe room is located. See @FEMA website for what a safe room should look like: http://bit.ly/2vJw3NA
